last_episode_to_air.name: Spring Break
last_episode_to_air.overview: Spring Break is an excuse for Garrison to jump back into his former depraved lifestyle.

name: South Park
overview: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: This is the season that started it all! Join Stan, Kyle Cartman and Kenny as these four animated tykes take on the supernatural, the extraordinary and the insane. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they discover the identity of Cartman's father, learn about Conjoined Twin-Myslexia and thaw a prehistoric ice man. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Return to everyone’s favorite mountain town for seventeen outrageously bizarre episodes of South Park. Along the way, you’ll meet the Succubus, get caught up in the Chinpokomon frenzy and find out why citizens are spontaneously combusting.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they graduate to 4th grade, join in the 2000 election recount, the controversy over Saddam Hussein, and the introduction of Timmy!!! For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they welcome Jimmy the new handi-capable kid in town & Towelie, Radiohead guest stars, Big Gay Al returns, and Terrance and Phillip break up. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: In this series Stan convinces the boys to kidnap all the calves from a local farm after a look at how veal is made turns him vegetarian; Professor Chaos struggles to find an evil scheme that hasn't already been done on 'The Simpsons'; and when Bebe's breasts begin to take shape, the boys can't understand why they're suddenly interested in her.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they go gaga for “Queer Eye,” start their own Christian Rock Band, and discover that Earth is an intergalactic reality show that's about to be cancelled. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they witness the girls’ celebrity-worship of ditzy, rich, sex-tape-making socialites and take part in an awesome anime battle with Professor Chaos. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they deal with the perceived dangers of global warming, a certain actor's sexuality is questioned, and the Pope arrives to witness a religious miracle. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they witness the death of Chef, defeat a virtual villain out to destroy the world, and suffer the consequences of Cartman’s video game console obsession. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: It’s a season of diabolical secrets as Cartman covers up a salacious photo and the boys reveal a bizarre Easter society. An explosive visit from Hillary Clinton, a world-record crap and the Imaginationland trilogy only add to the awesomeness of Season 11.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as they help a pop-princess down on her luck, negotiate a truce for striking Canadians, fight the addiction of "cheesing" and battle startling rodents. For them, it's all part of growing up in South Park

seasons.name: Season 13
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle as they save the economy, the whales, and a bunch of dead celebrities all while discovering the joys of Fish Sticks. For them, it's all part of growing up in South Park

seasons.name: Season 14
seasons.overview: This series finds Stan, Kyle, Cartman, Kenny, Butters and co getting into fixes through their usual blend of innocence and mischievousness. As well as coming to terms with the perils of social networking and being accused of sex addiction in the furore that sweeps the nation in the wake of the revelations surrounding Tiger Woods, the boys finally reveal the identity of the suitably mysterious Mysterion in a three-part special.

seasons.name: Season 15
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny in the fifteenth season as they confront modern mad scientists, fundamentalist agnostics, and face their greatest challenge yet -- Stan growing a year older. For them, it's all part of growing up in South Park.

seasons.name: Season 16
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle as they hunt down the mythical Jewpacabra, ‘sketti wrestle with reality stars, and go jackin’ it in San Diego. For them, it's all part of growing up in South Park.

seasons.name: Season 17
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Princess Kenny as they infiltrate the NSA, thwart patient zero, tame some strange and fight in the greatest battle of their young, hot lives.

seasons.name: Season 18
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle as they get lost in virtual reality, go underground with Cock Magic, and uncover the shocking truth about a music superstar. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 19
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle as Mr. Garrison makes a bid for the White House, Randy takes the lead in gentrifying the town, and everyone is looking for their safe space. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 20
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle as they confront online trolling, face the member berry epidemic, and come to terms with Cartman having a girlfriend. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 21
seasons.overview: Join Cartman, Kenny, Stan, and Kyle as they take on the opioid epidemic, experiment with water bears, dig into the underbelly of social media and go to war with Canada. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 22
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman, Kenny as they deal the vaping epidemic, Cartman’s anxiety disorder, and the fact that they didn't take the threat of ManBearPig "cereal" enough the first time around. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 23
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman, Kenny, and Randy as they explore the wonders of the human biome, tackle the consequences of immigration, and get banned in China. For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!

seasons.name: Season 24
seasons.overview: Join Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny as they navigate the COVID-19 pandemic. Will the broship survive as vaccines become available? For them, it’s all part of growing up in South Park!
